definitions.definition: Inquisitiveness ; the tendency to ask and learn about things by asking questions, investigating, or exploring .
A unique or extraordinary object which arouses interest .
examples: He put the strangely shaped rock in his curiosity cabinet.

definitions.definition: Careful, delicate construction ; fine workmanship, delicacy of building.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Inquisitiveness ; the tendency to ask and learn about things by asking questions, investigating, or exploring . [from 17th c.]
secondary_definitions: A unique or extraordinary object which arouses interest . [from 17th c.]
( obsolete ) Careful, delicate construction ; fine workmanship, delicacy of building. [16th–19th c.]
